comments:
John Houston spotted and evaluated the problem.


Look like that IPublishTask need to extends and PublishTaskDelegate need to
implelments IOrdered to avoid the ClassCastException.

And, 
    public int PublishTask.getOrder() {
         if (delegate == null) {
             try {
                 return getDelegate().getOrder();
             } catch (Throwable t) {
                 Trace.trace(Trace.SEVERE, "Could not create delegate" +
toString() + ": " + t.getMessage());
             }
         }
         return 0;
    }
